Connectivity & Offline Mode

Online
Internet Connected
Ollama (Local AI) Available
0
Checks Run
30s
Check Interval
0
Queued Ops
0
Cached Sections

Actions

Operation Queue

No queued operations.

State Transition History

No state transitions recorded.

How it works: CAM checks internet (dns.google:443) and Ollama (/api/tags) every 30 seconds. When offline, local operations (service records, CRM, inventory, scheduling) continue normally. Operations requiring connectivity are queued and processed automatically when the connection returns.

Deploy New Agent

Configure a new agent and generate install commands. Run the generated command on the target machine (Raspberry Pi, laptop, etc.) to set up a CAM agent connector.

Capabilities:

Install Commands

One-Liner (curl)
Paste this on the target machine â€” downloads and runs installer

                    

                


                
                

                    

                        

                            
Non-Interactive Install

                            
For when the installer is already on the machine

                        

                        
                    

                    

                        

                    

                


                
                

                    

                        

                            
Manual (connector only)

                            
Just run the connector directly â€” no systemd, no installer

                        

                        
                    

                    

                        

                    

                


                
                

                    

                        

                            
USB Deployment

                            
Prepare a USB drive, then install offline on the target

                        

                        
                    

                    

                        

                    

                


                

                    Requirements: Target machine needs Ubuntu, Debian, or Raspbian.
                    The installer handles Python, pip, Avahi (mDNS), systemd service creation,
                    and the initial connection test. The agent will auto-reconnect if the dashboard
                    is temporarily unreachable.
